title: Game loading problem
body: So I just played a game of ranked, and around 3 people from our team couldnt join the game, including myself. The loading screen was froze for around 5 minutes. So I had to force quit the client and restart it to get back into the game which was nearly already over. Turns out that other people in my team had the same problem. Im not sure if it's a server problem, or someone using hack to glitch us out, but i thought Loss Prevented was expected but that did not happen and people lost lp for some unknown reason which we did not deserve. I think Riot should investigate this issue and if it happens to be the server's problem, it needs to be fixed so that other players shouldn't be effected by any of this.

replies.body: This happens from time to time - sometimes the client just crashes you out. Did you try resetting your modem to see if it was an internet related issue?
